00018 /*
00019  * macguffin block encrypt/decrypt
00020  * unrolled, constant mask (optimized) version
00021  * 
00022  * For a complete description of MacGuffin, see
00023  * M. Blaze & B. Schneier, "The MacGuffin Block Cipher Algorithm",
00024  * proc. 2nd Workshop on Cryptographic Algorithms, Leuven, Belgium, 1994.
00025  *
00026  * 10/4/94 matt blaze
00027  */
00028 
00029 #include "mcg.h"
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * codebook encrypt one block with given expanded key
00033  */
00034 mcg_block_encrypt(blk,key)
00035      unsigned char *blk;
00036      mcg_key *key;
00037 
00038 {
00039         unsigned short r0, r1, r2, r3, a, b, c;
00040         int i;
00041         unsigned short *ek;
00042 
00043         r0=blk[0]|(blk[1]<<8);
00044         r1=blk[2]|(blk[3]<<8);
00045         r2=blk[4]|(blk[5]<<8);
00046         r3=blk[6]|(blk[7]<<8);
00047         
00048         ek = &(key->val[0]);
00049         /*
00050          * round loop, unrolled 4x
00051          */
00052         for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00053                 a = r1 ^ *(ek++);
00054                 b = r2 ^ *(ek++);
00055                 c = r3 ^ *(ek++);
00056                 r0 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00057                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00058                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00059                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00060                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00061                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00062                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00063                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00064                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00065                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00066                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00067                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00068                 a = r2 ^ *(ek++);
00069                 b = r3 ^ *(ek++);
00070                 c = r0 ^ *(ek++);
00071                 r1 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00072                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00073                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00074                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00075                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00076                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00077                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00078                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00079                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00080                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00081                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00082                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00083                 a = r3 ^ *(ek++);
00084                 b = r0 ^ *(ek++);
00085                 c = r1 ^ *(ek++);
00086                 r2 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00087                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00088                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00089                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00090                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00091                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00092                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00093                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00094                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00095                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00096                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00097                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00098                 a = r0 ^ *(ek++);
00099                 b = r1 ^ *(ek++);
00100                 c = r2 ^ *(ek++);
00101                 r3 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00102                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00103                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00104                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00105                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00106                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00107                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00108                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00109                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00110                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00111                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00112                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00113         }
00114         blk[0] = r0;
00115         blk[1] = r0>>8;
00116         blk[2] = r1;
00117         blk[3] = r1>>8;
00118         blk[4] = r2;
00119         blk[5] = r2>>8;
00120         blk[6] = r3;
00121         blk[7] = r3>>8;
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*
00125  * codebook decrypt one block with given expanded key
00126  */
00127 mcg_block_decrypt(blk,key)
00128      unsigned char *blk;
00129      mcg_key *key;
00130 
00131 {
00132         unsigned short r0, r1, r2, r3, a, b, c;
00133         int i;
00134         unsigned short *ek;
00135 
00136         r0=blk[0]|(blk[1]<<8);
00137         r1=blk[2]|(blk[3]<<8);
00138         r2=blk[4]|(blk[5]<<8);
00139         r3=blk[6]|(blk[7]<<8);
00140 
00141         ek = &(key->val[KSIZE]);
00142         /*
00143          * round loop, unrolled 4x
00144          */
00145         for (i=0; i<8; ++i) {
00146                 c = r2 ^ *(--ek);
00147                 b = r1 ^ *(--ek);
00148                 a = r0 ^ *(--ek);
00149                 r3 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00150                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00151                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00152                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00153                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00154                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00155                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00156                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00157                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00158                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00159                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00160                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00161                 c = r1 ^ *(--ek);
00162                 b = r0 ^ *(--ek);
00163                 a = r3 ^ *(--ek);
00164                 r2 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00165                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00166                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00167                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00168                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00169                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00170                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00171                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00172                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00173                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00174                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00175                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00176                 c = r0 ^ *(--ek);
00177                 b = r3 ^ *(--ek);
00178                 a = r2 ^ *(--ek);
00179                 r1 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00180                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00181                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00182                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00183                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00184                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00185                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00186                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00187                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00188                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00189                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00190                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00191                 c = r3 ^ *(--ek);
00192                 b = r2 ^ *(--ek);
00193                 a = r1 ^ *(--ek);
00194                 r0 ^= ((OUT0 & stable[(a & LOOK00) |
00195                                       (b & LOOK01) |
00196                                       (c & LOOK02)])
00197                        | (OUT1 & stable[(a & LOOK10) |
00198                                         (b & LOOK11) |
00199                                         (c & LOOK12)])
00200                        | (OUT2 & stable[(a & LOOK20) |
00201                                         (b & LOOK21) |
00202                                         (c & LOOK22)])
00203                        | (OUT3 & stable[(a & LOOK30) |
00204                                         (b & LOOK31) |
00205                                         (c & LOOK32)]));
00206         }
00207         blk[0] = r0;
00208         blk[1] = r0>>8;
00209         blk[2] = r1;
00210         blk[3] = r1>>8;
00211         blk[4] = r2;
00212         blk[5] = r2>>8;
00213         blk[6] = r3;
00214         blk[7] = r3>>8;
00215 }
